Vals.com.twofortyfouram.locale.intent.extra.B: An activity with the title Input activity test and items of Hints of inputs
Vals.net.dinglisch.android.tasker.RELEVANT_VA:
<StringArray sr=""><_array_net.dinglisch.android.tasker.RELEVANT_VARIABLES0>%is_list() Input is finished: Array of all items in the inputs is returned
</_array_net.dinglisch.android.tasker.RELEVANT_VARIABLES0><_array_net.dinglisch.android.tasker.RELEVANT_VARIABLES1>%is_status Input is finished: Submit is returned Back button pressed: Cancel is returned
</_array_net.dinglisch.android.tasker.RELEVANT_VARIABLES1></StringArray>

Vals.com.twofortyfouram.locale.intent.extra.B: An activity with the title List activity and items of Item 1, item 2, item 3
Vals.net.dinglisch.android.tasker.RELEVANT_VA:
<StringArray sr=""><_array_net.dinglisch.android.tasker.RELEVANT_VARIABLES0>%ls_list() List is finished: Array of all items in the list is returned
</_array_net.dinglisch.android.tasker.RELEVANT_VARIABLES0><_array_net.dinglisch.android.tasker.RELEVANT_VARIABLES1>%ls_command List item is clicked: Text for that item is returned
</_array_net.dinglisch.android.tasker.RELEVANT_VARIABLES1><_array_net.dinglisch.android.tasker.RELEVANT_VARIABLES2>%ls_index List item is clicked: Index for that item is returned
</_array_net.dinglisch.android.tasker.RELEVANT_VARIABLES2></StringArray>

Vals.com.twofortyfouram.locale.intent.extra.B: A map activity with the title Map Activity
Vals.net.dinglisch.android.tasker.RELEVANT_VA:
<StringArray sr=""><_array_net.dinglisch.android.tasker.RELEVANT_VARIABLES0>%ma_cords() Marker is clicked: coordinates returned
</_array_net.dinglisch.android.tasker.RELEVANT_VARIABLES0><_array_net.dinglisch.android.tasker.RELEVANT_VARIABLES1>%ma_address Marker is clicked: address returned (if one exists)
</_array_net.dinglisch.android.tasker.RELEVANT_VARIABLES1></StringArray>

Vals.com.twofortyfouram.locale.intent.extra.B: An activity with the title Dialog test and items of 1st button
Vals.net.dinglisch.android.tasker.RELEVANT_VA:
<StringArray sr=""><_array_net.dinglisch.android.tasker.RELEVANT_VARIABLES0>%md_command Dialog item is clicked: command is returned Dialog is dismissed: Dismissed is returned
</_array_net.dinglisch.android.tasker.RELEVANT_VARIABLES0></StringArray>

Vals.net.dinglisch.android.tasker.RELEVANT_VA: <StringArray sr=""><_array_net.dinglisch.android.tasker.RELEVANT_VARIABLES0>%cd_command() An array of items is returned The item depends on the type, text returns name, switch returns checked status, Progress returns the amount, and spinner returns selected item </_array_net.dinglisch.android.tasker.RELEVANT_VARIABLES0><_array_net.dinglisch.android.tasker.RELEVANT_VARIABLES1>%cd_extra Any extra data is returned here (dialog button, back pressed, etc) </_array_net.dinglisch.android.tasker.RELEVANT_VARIABLES1></StringArray>

Vals.com.twofortyfouram.locale.intent.extra.B: All plugin actions currently running will be dismissed
Title: Profile A, Profil B Items: 1st, 2nd, 3rd Commands:
Vals.net.dinglisch.android.tasker.RELEVANT_VA:
<StringArray sr=""><_array_net.dinglisch.android.tasker.RELEVANT_VARIABLES0>%nd_command Drawer item pressed: Command is returned
Drawer hidden: "Dismissed" returned
NOTE: In this new update some options are missing, but they will soon be added back along with many more</_array_net.dinglisch.android.tasker.RELEVANT_VARIABLES0><_array_net.dinglisch.android.tasker.RELEVANT_VARIABLES1>%nd_profile Returns the name of the currently selected profile in the drawer
</_array_net.dinglisch.android.tasker.RELEVANT_VARIABLES1></StringArray>
